thread.title: Sluggish UK to grow a bit faster - Hammond

title: Sluggish UK to grow a bit faster - Hammond
text:
Sluggish UK to grow a bit faster - Hammond 2:47am IST - 01:48 
Britain's sluggish economy looks set for more weak growth stretching over the next five years, but finance minister Philip Hammond, delivering a half-yearly update on the government finances, says the economy will expand by 1.5 percent in 2018, up from a forecast of 1.4 percent in November. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Britain's sluggish economy looks set for more weak growth stretching over the next five years, but finance minister Philip Hammond, delivering a half-yearly update on the government finances, says the economy will expand by 1.5 percent in 2018, up from a forecast of 1.4 percent in November.
